pkgmetadata.longdescription: =========pyKML=========pyKML is a Python package for parsing and authoring KML documents. It is basedon the lxml.objectify API (http://codespeak.net/lxml/objectify.html) whichprovides Pythonic access to XML documents... figure:: http://pykml.googlecode.com/hg/docs/source/logo/pyKML_logo_200x200.png :scale: 100 % :alt: pyKML logoSee the Package Documentation for information on installation and usage.
